description.value:
Master Crafted Relic Auspex of the Mentors Chapter. Functions as a regular Auspex, but with a range of 1km, that cannot be blocked by terrain or other inhibiting materials, and requires no Tech-Use Test to set the Auspex to scan for unusual readings.

Effect: Famed

Notes: 30 R
